description: Your cluster's installation is blocked due to there being no egress route defined in your cluster's private subnet. Please review the network configuration, and try re-installing the cluster. For more information refer to the documentation: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/install_rosa_classic_clusters/rosa-aws-privatelink-creating-cluster#.
